sangithaya, (gayanaya, wadanaya) narthanaya natyamaya jawanika ketharam ekineka samipa bawak athi kale da yanna gana kalpana karaddi ee wenuwen adala kshethra thunema guruwarun ketharam kapakirimakin ekineka paraya noyana andamin sidu kota thibu mehewara pasasannata labima imahath bhagyayak kota salakami.monarage bhawa wilasayan mathu kala narthanaya, yashodhara dewiyage karuna rasayen yuthu premaya, wedikawa matha nawa nirmanathmakawa goda nangunu golu hadawathe ‘sugath dammi aadara andaraya’, saliya ashokamala pilibanda liyawunu ‘kawuruda me mal kumariya’ wani sangithanga ha narthananga wadath ma sith gath anga hatiyata satahan karanu kamaththemi.wiwidha mathawadayanta thudu dena nuthana premaya wani wishayayak athishaya sanyamayakin idiripath kirima apa sith thula da anagathaya pilibanda balaporoththu wadi kala bawa kiwa yuthu ya.
amu miris , umbalakada da sihinwa liya gena, pol samanga mishra karaganna.

ewakata wiwidha anthawadi mathawada osse jathika satana diyath kirimata samahara balawega katayuthu kalada wijayawardhana mahatha thama puwathpath osse perata gena aawe madahath saha anthawadi nowana pragathishili adahasya.ohu kisidu witeka sinhala jathiyata saha ingrisi uuruwata pamanak alum kala ayaku yayi sandahan kala nohakke ohu wisin thinakaran saha waramanjari yana demala prakashana pala kala nisaya.1930 wana wita prathamawarata siyalu ansha niyojanaya karana sahithya deshapalanaya aagamika yana thun parshawayama ragath irida puwathpathak lesa silumina puwathpatha aarambha karana athara awuruddak athulatha silumina merata janapriyathama sinhala sathi antha puwathpatha wu athara shatha dahaye wishwawidyalaya yana wirudawaliya labannata silumina samath wanne di aar wijewardhana mahatha thula thibu itha usas chinthana saha sankalpa nisaya.

ehidi ohu kiya sitiye rakshithayaka sarisarana atheku iwath kirimata nithimaya prathipadana nomathi namuth, ema saththwaya margayata paminima  walakwima sandaha wishesha kriyamarga gena athi bawayi.emenma samastha lanka gowijana sammelanaya thambauththegama disthrik lekam karyalaya idiripita eeye udghoshanayaka niratha wuye wana ali tharjanaya hethuwen thama kumbauru ha gowibim winasha wi athi bawa pawasamin.me athara, prathikara labadima sandaha pinnawala ali anathagaraya wetha lori rathayakin ragena emin sitiyadi anathurata lakwa pasuwa prathikara labamin sitiyadi "kandula" aliya miya yame siddhiya sambandhayen soya balimata wishramika shreshtadhikarana winisuruwarayekuge pradhanathwayen yuth wishesha kamituwak da path kara thibenawa.
